writer.name: 大卫·M·罗森索 David M. Rosenthal

introduction: Co-written by Jennie Snyder Urman and former Jane the Virgin co-executive producer David Rosenthal, You’re Killing Me for CBS All Access centers on Gracie who thought she was cursed with an overbearing mother. But when her mom dies unexpectedly and haunts Gracie for real, Gracie’s worst nightmare becomes her mom’s dream come true. Urman, Rosenthal and Rodriguez executive produce with Klein and Emily Gipson.
